body: Enjoy the beauty of Santa Barbara and have a toast of the bubbly with that someone special. You can choose between Champagne or Sparkling Cider. Capture the Romance of Santa Barbara. Our professionally guided tour includes a kayak lesson/briefing, all kayak gear and paddles. Your tour starts at the boat launch, winds through the harbor, under Stearns Wharf, and out to the one mile buoy. Chances are good the locals will show up to greet you. Dolphins, California sea lions, and harbor seals may cruise by to say hello.
timeLong:
Timing is flexible, call to book

Tour typically lasts 60-90 minutes
title: Champagne Kayak Tour

email.description: Enjoy the beauty of Santa Barbara and have a toast of the bubbly with that someone special. You can choose between Champagne or Sparkling Cider. Capture the Romance of Santa Barbara. Our professionally guided tour includes a kayak lesson/briefing, all kayak gear and paddles. Your tour starts at the boat launch, winds through the harbor, under Stearns Wharf, and out to the one mile buoy. You’ll stop twice along the way to have a toast and drink some bubbly. Chances are good the locals will show up to greet you. Dolphins, California sea lions, and harbor seals may cruise by to say hello.
email.description2: You will want to wear shorts or a swim suit and a light shirt. You may want to bring a sweat shirt, a waterproof jacket or a windbreaker (dress in layers) in case it is cool. You will warm up as you paddle. You might want to bring a change of clothes to change into after the tour. You'll get wet from the water dripping off the paddles. You’re welcome to bring a beverage to enjoy while paddling. We also recommend wearing sunscreen, sunglasses and a hat or visor.
email.directions: PLEASE FOLLOW THE WRITTEN DIRECTIONS BELOW TO MEET YOUR GUIDE. WE DO NOT PROVIDE TRANSPORTATION TO OR FROM THE HARBOR.  Directions: Arrive 15 minutes early for check-in.  Our guide will meet you at the boat launch inside the Santa Barbara Harbor. Exit the 101 freeway at Garden Street. At Garden Street turn away from the mountains (toward the ocean) go 0.3 miles. Turn right on E. Cabrillo Blvd. Drive 0.5 miles and turn left onto HARBOR WAY. Take the FIRST LEFT into the parking lot. Please make sure to take your FIRST LEFT. Take a ticket at Kiosk. (There is a small hourly parking fee.) Then drive forward through the gate. Continue until you come to a second gate, the gate will open automatically; you must get close to the gate.  Continue forward, the BOAT LAUNCH will be on the right about 200 yards. The address is 302 Cabrillo Blvd Santa Barbara CA 93101
email.gratuity: Gratuity: Our guides will do everything to make your tour special, please make sure to tip your guide. A standard tip is around $20 per person.
